events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th involving their car and another driver at an intersection.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial incident details provided by the customer.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle customer communication and assist with the claim process promptly.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer received confirmation with an estimated timeline for resolution.
Request sent to the customer for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and insurance details to proceed with investigation.
Customer provided all requested documents including the police report and damage photos ahead of the requested deadline.
Investigation initiated by claims department to verify details of the collision and assess liability and damage extent.
Investigation concluded with findings supporting the customer’s account; damages validated and liability determined.
Proposal sent to the customer detailing the settlement amount for vehicle repair costs and compensation for inconvenience.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the communication and process.
The claim was formally approved, authorizing the release of funds for vehicle repairs as per the agreed settlement.
Payment was issued to the customer’s repair shop to cover the costs agreed upon in the settlement.
The insurance claim was formally closed following confirmation of vehicle repairs and receipt of customer satisfaction.
